price: 73. Ir jie turi (kitą) naudą iš jų, ir jie gauna (pieną) gerti. Argi jie tada nebus dėkingi?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
